channel.title: LFI on Policy to Packets
channel.description: Recent content in LFI on Policy to Packets

item.title: (Writeup) LetsDefend EventID: 120 - [SOC170 - Passwd Found in Requested URL - Possible LFI Attack]
item.author: reedveggleston@gmail.com (Reed Eggleston)
item.description: Investigating a suspected local file inclusion alert after a directory traversal attempt targeted /etc/passwd, reviewing SIEM HTTP logs, and confirming the attack failed based on a 500 server response with no returned content.
